p: In order to evaluate the hemolytic potential of the bullfrog oil, the BBE, and the BME, an O + blood sample from a healthy donor was used aiming to evaluate the biocompatibility. The hemolytic potential of the Miglyol ® 812 used in the BME was also assessed. Thus, the blood sample was centrifuged at 1100 g for 10 min and the plasma was removed. Posteriorly, the erythrocytes suspension was washed three times with 0.9% saline solution and the cells concentration adjusted to 5% ( v/ v) (6 × 10 6 cell/mL) in 0.9% of saline solution.
